event.title: I Love Free Software Day in Villach, Austria

body.p: We often underestimate the power of a simple thank you. Everyone who contributes to or supports free software does valuable work for our society and deserves to be recognised. â€˜I Love Free Software Dayâ€™ on 14 February is an opportunity to show your gratitude with a â€œThank you for being part of free software!â€. On â€˜I Love Free Software Dayâ€™, we create a day that recognises and appreciates all this volunteer work by saying â€˜Thank you â™¥â€™ to all the people behind the free software projects and those who are committed to it. With a simple thank you on 14 February, we show that we appreciate the efforts of the contributors to free software.

ul.li: ğŸ“ We will celebrate together with you at HTBLuVA Villach, Tschinowitscher Weg 5, 9500 Villach, Austria

body.p: Free Software is not just any kind of software: it represents a community. Free Software empowers us to use, understand, share, and improve the software. Letâ€™s build a community for Free Software together â€” a community that values and welcomes each other â€” by celebrating the software that empowers us. That is why you are invited to join our event the â€œI â™¥ Free Software Day - Carinthiaâ€. Weâ€™ll host a small installation party featuring F-Droid, Linux, and more, we express our thanks to maintainers, and enjoy good coffee and cake together. Itâ€™s the perfect setting to chat about Free Software topics and also to install some! :)
